sqlMap.select: select * from T_BUSSINESS where ID IN (SELECT C_BUSSINESSID FROM T_AGENTREFBUSSINESS WHERE C_AGENTID = #value#)

select ID as id, C_CODE as code, C_AGENTTYPE as agenttype, C_AGENTVSDATE as agentvsdate, C_AGENTVEDATE as agentvedate, C_AGENTCOMPANYNAME as agentcompanyname, C_AGENTSHORTNAME as agentshortname, C_AGENTCITYID as agentcityid, C_AGENTTEL as agenttel, C_AGENTADDRESS as agentaddress, C_AGENTPOSTCODE as agentpostcode, C_AGENTCONTACTNAME as agentcontactname, C_AGENTEMAIL as agentemail, C_AGENTCHECKSTATUS as agentcheckstatus, C_AGENTISENABLE as agentisenable, C_MODIFYTIME as modifytime, C_MODIFYUSER as modifyuser, C_CREATETIME as createtime, C_CREATEUSER as createuser, C_PARENTID as parentid, C_PARENTSTR as parentstr, C_BROKENUM as brokenum, C_CHILDBROKENUM as childbrokenum, C_ALIPAYACCOUNT as alipayaccount, C_TENPAYACCOUNT as tenpayaccount, C_KUAIBILLACCOUNT as kuaibillaccount, C_MSNQQ as msnqq, C_BIGTYPE as bigtype, C_USERID as userid, C_CACODE as cacode, C_CZCODE as czcode, C_MUCODE as mucode, C_RUNTYPE as runtype, C_RUNVALUE as runvalue, C_WEBSITE as website, C_AGENTPHONE as agentphone, C_AGENRFAX as agenrfax, C_AGENTMOBILE as agentmobile, C_AGENTOTHER as agentother, C_INDUSTRY as industry, C_FINANCENAME as financename, C_FINANCEPHONE as financephone, C_FINANCEFAX as financefax, C_FINANCEMOBILE as financemobile, C_FINANCEEMAIL as financeemail, C_SELFCODE as selfcode, C_AIRPORTCODE as airportcode, C_ISMODIFYRET as ismodifyret, C_WORKTIMEBEGIN as worktimebegin, C_SMSMONEY as smsmoney, C_AGENTJIBIE as agentjibie, C_CITYID as cityid, C_WORKTIMEEND as worktimeend, C_VMONEY as vmoney, C_ISALLOWMONTHPAY as isallowmonthpay, C_ALLOWLEVELCOUNT as allowlevelcount, C_ALLOWPROXYCOUNT as allowproxycount, C_OUTTICKETMANTEL as outticketmantel, C_OUTTICKETMANMSNQQ as outticketmanmsnqq, C_BACKTICKETMANTEL as backticketmantel, C_TYPE as type, C_FIXEDVALUE as fixedvalue, C_SEARCHTOALL as searchtoall, C_SEARCHNUM as searchnum, C_BEIZHU as beizhu, C_BACKTICKETMANMSNQQ as backticketmanmsnqq
from T_CUSTOMERAGENT C
$where$
$orderby$
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(ID),0)+1 AS VALUE FROM T_CUSTOMERAGENT
insert into T_CUSTOMERAGENT ( ID, C_CODE, C_AGENTTYPE, C_AGENTVSDATE, C_AGENTVEDATE, C_AGENTCOMPANYNAME, C_AGENTSHORTNAME, C_AGENTCITYID, C_AGENTTEL, C_AGENTADDRESS, C_AGENTPOSTCODE, C_AGENTCONTACTNAME, C_AGENTEMAIL, C_AGENTCHECKSTATUS, C_AGENTISENABLE, C_MODIFYTIME, C_MODIFYUSER, C_CREATETIME, C_CREATEUSER, C_PARENTID, C_PARENTSTR, C_BROKENUM, C_CHILDBROKENUM, C_ALIPAYACCOUNT, C_TENPAYACCOUNT, C_KUAIBILLACCOUNT, C_MSNQQ, C_BIGTYPE, C_USERID, C_CACODE, C_CZCODE, C_MUCODE, C_RUNTYPE, C_RUNVALUE, C_WEBSITE, C_AGENTPHONE, C_AGENRFAX, C_AGENTMOBILE, C_AGENTOTHER, C_INDUSTRY, C_FINANCENAME, C_FINANCEPHONE, C_FINANCEFAX, C_FINANCEMOBILE, C_FINANCEEMAIL,
C_AIRPORTCODE, C_ISMODIFYRET, C_WORKTIMEBEGIN, C_SMSMONEY,
C_AGENTJIBIE, C_CITYID, C_WORKTIMEEND, C_ISALLOWMONTHPAY, C_ALLOWLEVELCOUNT, C_ALLOWPROXYCOUNT, C_OUTTICKETMANTEL, C_OUTTICKETMANMSNQQ, C_BACKTICKETMANTEL, C_BACKTICKETMANMSNQQ, C_TYPE, C_FIXEDVALUE, C_BEIZHU, C_SEARCHTOALL, C_SEARCHNUM, C_VMONEY
) values (
#id#,
#code#,
#agenttype:DECIMAL#,
#agentvsdate#,
#agentvedate#,
#agentcompanyname#,
#agentshortname#,
#agentcityid:DECIMAL#,
#agenttel#,
#agentaddress#,
#agentpostcode#,
#agentcontactname#,
#agentemail#,
#agentcheckstatus:DECIMAL#,
#agentisenable:DECIMAL#,
#modifytime#,
#modifyuser#,
#createtime#,
#createuser#,
#parentid:DECIMAL#,
#parentstr#,
#brokenum:DECIMAL#,
#childbrokenum:DECIMAL#,
#alipayaccount#,
#tenpayaccount#,
#kuaibillaccount#,
#msnqq#,
#bigtype#,
#userid#,
#cacode#,
#czcode#,
#mucode#,
#runtype#,
#runvalue#,
#website#,
#agentphone#,
#agenrfax#,
#agentmobile#,
#agentother#,
#industry#,
#financename#,
#financephone#,
#financefax#,
#financemobile#,
#financeemail#,
#airportcode#,
#ismodifyret#,
#worktimebegin#,
#smsmoney:DECIMAL#,
#agentjibie#,
#cityid#,
#worktimeend#,
#isallowmonthpay#, #allowlevelcount#, #allowproxycount#, #outticketmantel#, #outticketmanmsnqq#, #backticketmantel#, #backticketmanmsnqq#, #type#, #fixedvalue#, #beizhu#, #searchtoall#, #searchnum#, #vmoney#
)
sqlMap.update:
update T_CUSTOMERAGENT set C_CODE = #code#, C_AGENTVSDATE = #agentvsdate#, C_AGENTVEDATE = #agentvedate#, C_AGENTCOMPANYNAME = #agentcompanyname#, C_AGENTSHORTNAME = #agentshortname#, C_AGENTCITYID = #agentcityid:DECIMAL#, C_AGENTTEL = #agenttel#, C_AGENTADDRESS = #agentaddress#, C_AGENTPOSTCODE = #agentpostcode#, C_AGENTCONTACTNAME = #agentcontactname#, C_AGENTEMAIL = #agentemail#, C_AGENTCHECKSTATUS = #agentcheckstatus:DECIMAL#, C_AGENTISENABLE = #agentisenable:DECIMAL#, C_MODIFYTIME = #modifytime#, C_MODIFYUSER = #modifyuser#, C_CREATETIME = #createtime#, C_CREATEUSER = #createuser#, C_PARENTID = #parentid:DECIMAL#, C_PARENTSTR = #parentstr#, C_BROKENUM = #brokenum:DECIMAL#, C_CHILDBROKENUM = #childbrokenum:DECIMAL#, C_ALIPAYACCOUNT = #alipayaccount#, C_TENPAYACCOUNT = #tenpayaccount#, C_KUAIBILLACCOUNT = #kuaibillaccount#, C_MSNQQ = #msnqq#, C_BIGTYPE = #bigtype#, C_USERID = #userid#, C_CACODE = #cacode#, C_CZCODE = #czcode#, C_MUCODE = #mucode#, C_RUNTYPE = #runtype#, C_RUNVALUE = #runvalue#, C_WEBSITE = #website#, C_TYPE = #type#, C_FIXEDVALUE = #fixedvalue#, C_AGENTPHONE = #agentphone#, C_AGENRFAX = #agenrfax#, C_AGENTMOBILE = #agentmobile#, C_AGENTOTHER = #agentother#, C_INDUSTRY = #industry#, C_FINANCENAME = #financename#, C_FINANCEPHONE = #financephone#, C_FINANCEFAX = #financefax#, C_FINANCEMOBILE = #financemobile#, C_FINANCEEMAIL = #financeemail#, C_AIRPORTCODE=#airportcode#, C_ISMODIFYRET=#ismodifyret#, C_WORKTIMEBEGIN=#worktimebegin#, C_SMSMONEY=#smsmoney#, C_AGENTJIBIE=#agentjibie#, C_CITYID=#cityid#, C_WORKTIMEEND=#worktimeend#, C_ISALLOWMONTHPAY=#isallowmonthpay#, C_ALLOWLEVELCOUNT=#allowlevelcount#, C_ALLOWPROXYCOUNT=#allowproxycount#, C_OUTTICKETMANTEL=#outticketmantel#, C_OUTTICKETMANMSNQQ=#outticketmanmsnqq#, C_BACKTICKETMANTEL=#backticketmantel#, C_BACKTICKETMANMSNQQ=#backticketmanmsnqq#, C_BEIZHU=#beizhu#, C_SEARCHTOALL=#searchtoall#, C_SEARCHNUM=#searchnum#, C_VMONEY =#vmoney#
where ID = #id#
